description: InferSNOMEDCT detects possible medical concepts as entities and links them to codes from the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine, Clinical Terms (SNOMED-CT) ontology.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: The input text to be analyzed using InferSNOMEDCT.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: The collection of medical concept entities extracted from the input text and their associated information. For each entity, the response provides the entity text, the entity category, where the entity text begins and ends, and the level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the detection and analysis. Attributes and traits of the entity are also returned.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for the entity. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted as this entity.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the detected entity. Possible categories are MEDICAL_CONDITION, ANATOMY, or TEST_TREATMENT_PROCEDURE.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Describes the specific type of entity with category of entities. Possible types include DX_NAME, ACUITY, DIRECTION, SYSTEM_ORGAN_SITE, TEST_NAME, TEST_VALUE, TEST_UNIT, PROCEDURE_NAME, or TREATMENT_NAME.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detected entity.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: An extracted segment of the text that is an attribute of an entity, or otherwise related to an entity, such as the dosage of a medication taken.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the detected attribute. Possible categories include MEDICAL_CONDITION, ANATOMY, and TEST_TREATMENT_PROCEDURE.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute. Possible types include DX_NAME, ACUITY, DIRECTION, SYSTEM_ORGAN_SITE,TEST_NAME, TEST_VALUE, TEST_UNIT, PROCEDURE_NAME, and TREATMENT_NAME.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as an attribute.

nested_items.name: RelationshipScore
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that this attribute is correctly related to this entity.

nested_items.name: RelationshipType
nested_items.description: The type of relationship that exists between the entity and the related attribute.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for this attribute. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted as this attribute.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for an attribute. Examples include signs, symptoms, diagnosis, and negation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name or contextual description of a detected trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of a detected trait.

nested_items.name: SNOMEDCTConcepts
nested_items.description: The SNOMED-CT concepts specific to an attribute, along with a score indicating the likelihood of the match.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The numeric ID for the SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the entity should be linked to the identified SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for the entity.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name or contextual description of a detected trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of a detected trait.

nested_items.name: SNOMEDCTConcepts
nested_items.description: The SNOMED concepts that the entity could refer to, along with a score indicating the likelihood of the match.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The numeric ID for the SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the entity should be linked to the identified SNOMED-CT concept.

nested_items.name: PaginationToken
nested_items.description: If the result of the request is truncated, the pagination token can be used to fetch the next page of entities.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model used to analyze the documents, in the format n.n.n You can use this information to track the model used for a particular batch of documents.

nested_items.name: SNOMEDCTDetails
nested_items.description: The details of the SNOMED-CT revision, including the edition, language, and version date.

nested_items.name: Edition
nested_items.description: The edition of SNOMED-CT used. The edition used for the InferSNOMEDCT editions is the US edition.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: The language used in the SNOMED-CT ontology. All Amazon Comprehend Medical operations are US English (en).

nested_items.name: VersionDate
nested_items.description: The version date of the SNOMED-CT ontology used.

nested_items.name: Characters
nested_items.description: The number of characters in the input request documentation.

nested_items.name: OriginalTextCharacters
nested_items.description: The number of characters present in the input text document as processed by Amazon Comprehend Medical.
